subject: Future of JUnit & Hamcrest
msgSnippet: I ve noticed that JUnit includes an (outdated) version of Hamcrest. Will future JUnit version continue to ship with Hamcrest? Do you have plans to update to
messageBody:
I've noticed that JUnit includes an (outdated) version of Hamcrest. Will future JUnit version continue to ship with Hamcrest? Do you have plans to update to Hamcrest 1.2 or higher? Why is there no junit-dep anymore, i.e. how are we supposed to use JUnit with Hamcrest 1.2?

Cheers,
Peter
